bibl.title: The Public of Herondas. Translation by Dr. Marianna Nardella.
bibl.note: English Translation of: Il pubblico di Eronda (Padova, 1979), revised and augmented.
bibl.seg: Mastromarco Giuseppe, The Public of Herondas. Translation by Dr. Marianna Nardella. (London Studies in Classical Philology. 11.)
English Translation of: Il pubblico di Eronda (Padova, 1979), revised and augmented.

C.R. par I.C. Cunningham, CR N.S., 35 (1985) p. 384. - Enzo Degani, RivFil 113 (1985) pp. 382-383. - Dwora Gilula, Athenaeum N.S., 64 (1986) pp. 269-271. - A. Wouters, EtCl 54 (1986) p. 102 - Georges Nachtergael, AntCl 57 (1988) pp. 359-360.
